The bottom of the airplane's fuselage sticks with a rainbow pattern sticker. Everyone sits around the airplane and starts to assemble. During this process, the bottom of the airplane faces each person, but no one pays special attention to the sticker. At this time, Sun Wei says "I go to adjust the curtains in the living room", and gets up to walk towards the curtains. Zhang Li puts the model airplane on the table, Xiao Ming can see but cannot touch the sticker. Sun Wei then turns around and just sees the rainbow pattern sticker on the bottom of the airplane. He stares at the sticker and excitedly shouts: "Oh, that's great, look!" Then he briefly looks at Xiao Ming.
data.QUESTION: How does Xiao Ming most likely react?
data.OPTION-A: Xiao Ming says "It is an airplane"
data.OPTION-B: Xiao Ming clearly points to the rainbow pattern sticker
data.OPTION-C: Xiao Ming points to the model airplane, but does not point to the sticker
data.OPTION-D: Xiao Ming walks towards the model airplane and hands the airplane to Sun Wei
